conditions.name: Hand, foot and mouth disease (HFMD)
conditions.summary: Common viral infection in young children causing blisters on hands, feet and mouth. Usually mild.

conditions.name: Chickenpox
conditions.summary: A highly contagious viral illness. Characteristic itchy vesicular rash and fever.

conditions.name: Allergic rash
conditions.summary: Skin reaction to allergens. Can be itchy and red; not usually infectious.

conditions.name: Measles
conditions.summary: Viral disease with fever and widespread rash; requires clinical assessment.
